version_description:
1. You can now add a new payee on SC Mobile India and initiate a transfer or payment on the go.
2. You can now view your ID and contact details on SC Mobile India.

1. You can now complete your Investment Profile on SC Mobile Banking
2. You can add a new payee on SC Mobile India and initiate a transfer or payment on the go.
3. You can also view your Identity and contact details on SC Mobile India.

1. You can now complete your Investment Profile on SC Mobile Banking
2. You can add a new payee on SC Mobile India and initiate a transfer or payment on the go.
3. You can also view your Identity and contact details on SC Mobile India.

Instant Registration for SC Mobile India
You can now register for SC Mobile India using your ATM / Debit or credit card details.

1) Now transfer funds to a Virtual Payment Address (VPA) using UPI service.
2) Funds transfer to a Virtual Payment Address (VPA) using UPI service is instant & available 24x7x365.
3) Update Common Reporting Standard (CRS) information under Profile Details section on SC Mobile India.

Introducing Mutual Funds on Mobile:
You can now transact in mutual funds, view your investment holdings and have access to our market commentaries and fund ideas on the go
Introducing CVV inquiry for eligible virtual credit card customers on Mobile: You can now start transacting online with credit card instantly.
Introducing CVV inquiry for eligible virtual credit card customers on Mobile: You can now start transacting online with credit card instantly.
Now send money to Virtual Payment Address using UPI.

Now make Payments using Bharat QR on SC Mobile.
Use the QR Payment option to scan the Bharat QR code at Merchant outlets to make secure payments using your StanChart Credit & Debit Cards.

Open Recurring Deposit Online

1. Market updates are now more accessible than ever. In a few clicks, read Market views on-the-go when you log in to SCB online banking in your desktop and mobile 24/7.
2. You can now also view your Prudential insurance policy(ies) purchased through us.
Bug fixes and other minor improvements
Bug fixes and other minor improvements

Introducing the all new Bill payments Platform, a one stop solution for all your payments needs!

The new bill payments platform offers you :
• 15 biller categories with 260+ billers
• Auto Payment on utility bills from your Credit Card or Bank Account
• Credit Card Bill/ Insurance Premium/ Mutual Fund payments
• Instant Payment for Water/ Gas/ Telecom/ DTH
• Payment facility to Charities/ Subscriptions/ Rent
• Better Customer Experience

Transfer money, make payments, request money or shop – UPI makes everything instant.
SC UPI is a simple and secured feature to instantly pay using UPI from SC Mobile Banking app.
